blocks.text: Quiet Friday at Pebble Beach — Hovland Chases Leaders
Light action across the sports world as Pebble Beach reached its third round. Viktor Hovland sits T46 at -5, ten shots behind co-leaders Akshay Bhatia and Ryo Hisatsune.
⛳ AT&T Pebble Beach Pro-Am R3 — Bhatia and Hisatsune share lead at -15, Hovland T46 (-5)
⚽ La Liga — Elche 0-0 Osasuna: Goalless draw in Friday's only European fixture
